original: Bergström, Karl-Erik Ragnar, över-lärare, Uddevalla, f. 15/2/02 i Örebro. G. 27 m. Jenny Högsten. Barn: Per-Erik f. 27, Karin 30. — Ing:ex. i Örebro 21, stud:ex. i Örebro 24, folkskol-l:ex. i Strängnäs 25. Lär. v. Åkerby skyddshem 25-27, v. Skövde folksk. 27-38, överlär. v. Vänersb. folksk. 39-43, v. Uddevalla folksk. fr. 44.
translated: Bergström, Karl-Erik Ragnar, Senior Teacher, Uddevalla, b. 15/2/02 in Örebro. Married on 27 with Jenny Högsten. Children: Per-Erik b. 27, Karin b. 30. — Passed the exams for primary school in Örebro in 1921, passed the secondary school exam in Örebro in 1924, and passed the teacher's exam in Strängnäs in 1925. Worked as a teacher at Åkerby Shelter from 1925-27, at Skövde Primary School from 1927-1938, as a senior teacher at Vänersborg Primary School from 1939-1943, and at Uddevalla Primary School from 1944 onwards.
